name: Black Diamond Zone Rock Shoes - Unisex
description: Get in the zone: complete focus, efficient flow, and confident movement. The Black Diamond Zone shoe is made with incredibly breathable mesh upper that stretches where you want, without bagging out. The downturned and aggressive shape, along with the sticky Fuse rubber, helps you get purchase on tiny footholds in steep terrain.Engineered Knit upper provides exceptional fit, breathability and comfort.Double Velcro® straps keep your foot locked in on aggressive heel hooks.Minimal, soft flex midsole keeps things sensitive in steep terrain.Moulded NeoFriction Fuse rubber provides confidence and grip on smears and small edges.Members typically size the same as their street shoe size.
